data.actual_result: It gets cluttered and they go on top of each other
data.expected_result: It's supposed to be farther away like in Stable
data.short_description: When sending two messages in a row, and then editing the second message, the editing box goes on top of the previous message or too close to it
data.steps_to_repro: - Send two messages in a row - Click edit on the second message - Observe the box and the previous message
